name: Nowhere Prophet - Digital Extras (Soundtrack, Artbook and more)
detailed_description:
The digital extras package expands the world of Nowhere Prophet beyond the game. Dive into the art book or the soundtrack.


The Art and Design of Nowhere Prophet

This 80+ page art book showcases the search for Soma. It provides an in-depth look into the development process of the game, from the first prototype to the final game. It contains many pictures from across the game's evolution: From sketches, concept art, early screenshots to vivid, full-page artwork.

The book is in English language and available as a PDF at 300 DPI.


The Nowhere Prophet Original Soundtrack

This haunting, India-infused electronic soundrack from Lightfrequency brings Soma to life. It contains a total of 17 tracks from the game.

  • Nowhere Prophet
  • Feral Instincts
  • Hum
  • Resistance
  • Ruins of Soma
  • Smoke and Rust
  • Murti Monstrosity
  • Lost
  • Mystic Host
  • Technopathic Aptitude
  • Carrion
  • Burning Roads
  • Solace
  • Hope
  • Narrow Path
  • Crypt
  • Decrypt

All music written, recorded and mixed by Mike Beaton.
Mastered by MM at Sleepy Volcano.

The soundtrack is available in MP3 format and includes the cover image.


Wallpaper Pack


Put the world of Nowhere Prophet into your home, work or pocket with these gorgeous wallpapers. Redecorate your digital world with some of the game's stunning artwork.

The wallpaper pack contains 5 desktop wallpapers for 4K and 1080P resolution and 6 phone wallpapers at 1497x2662 resolution, all in PNG format.


Avatar Pack


If you still can't get enough of Soma, why not grab one of the 40+ high-resolution profile pictures from the avatar pack and use it as your new identity. Whether raider or machine, there's something for everyone here.

The avatar pack contains 44 images files in PNG format at 1200x1200 pixel resolution.

short_description: The digital extras package contains the Nowhere Prophet art book, an 80+ page look at the evolution of the game's design and its striking art style, and the haunting OST from Lightfrequency, that breathes life into Soma and its many and varied inhabitants.
